name: Supermarket Dash
description:
Welcome to Supermarket Dash, this game was made during the Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2, the theme is  Let There Be Chaos. We hope you have as much fun playing it as we had developing it!

Programmer: Chandler Pope-Lewis
Level Designer: Isabela Bruna Rojas (TheMightyChloroplast)

Find all 4 food items you need from your shopping list and exit the store but don't get spotted by the guards!

Controls:
Move Forward: W
Move Backward: S
Move Left: A
Move Right: D
Run: Shift
Crouch: Ctrl
Pickup Item: E
Open List: L
